survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards eco-friendly packaging in the food and beverage industry.

questions.question_text: How often do you consider the environmental impact of packaging when purchasing food or beverages?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you consider the environmental impact of packaging when purchasing food or beverages?

questions.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly packaging materials are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly packaging materials are you most familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to choose eco-friendly packaging? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.client_notes: Use a drag-and-drop ranking interface if possible. Provide clear instructions.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to choose eco-friendly packaging? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)

questions.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for a product with eco-friendly packaging compared to conventional packaging?
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How much more would you be willing to pay for a product with eco-friendly packaging compared to conventional packaging?

questions.question_text: Have you ever avoided purchasing a product because of its non-eco-friendly packaging?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever avoided purchasing a product because of its non-eco-friendly packaging?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the product and why you avoided it.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the product and why you avoided it.

questions.question_text: Which of the following food or beverage categories do you think most needs eco-friendly packaging improvements? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow up to 3 selections. Include 'Other' option with text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following food or beverage categories do you think most needs eco-friendly packaging improvements? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How important is it for brands to clearly label their packaging as eco-friendly?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Randomize scale order if possible.

script.question_text: How important is it for brands to clearly label their packaging as eco-friendly?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from choosing eco-friendly packaging more often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' option with text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with optional open text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from choosing eco-friendly packaging more often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a brand that offers eco-friendly packaging, all else being equal?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a brand that offers eco-friendly packaging, all else being equal?

questions.question_text: Do you actively seek out information about a brand's sustainability practices before making a purchase?
answer_options: No, but I would like to
questions.client_notes: Provide clear, distinct options. Avoid overlapping responses.

script.question_text: Do you actively seek out information about a brand's sustainability practices before making a purchase?
answer_options: No, but I would like to

questions.question_text: What additional steps do you think brands should take to promote eco-friendly packaging?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional steps do you think brands should take to promote eco-friendly packaging?
